item.title: Shell
item.description: Scripting Arrays I think this is compatible with [[bash]]/[[notes/tools/zsh]], but not sure. I tend to stick to bash for scripts for portability, just in case.

item.title: zsh
item.description: A neat [[notes/programming/Shell]]. As far as I remember not quite [[POSIX]]-compliant like [[bash]] and therefore(?) not as portable, but a lot nicer.
